text: According to the 2025 Mexican Census, 1455 Portuguese lived in Mexico. Portugueses are concentrated in Nuevo León, Mexico City with the population of 703 followed by Mexico State (78), Jalisco (51) and Querétaro (20). == Statistics == Portuguese Mexicans Portuguese Mexicans Portuguese Mexicans Portuguese Mexicans Portuguese Mexicans Year Portugueses in Mexico 2000 297 2005 420 2010 504 2020 731 2025 1455 ==Related pages== * Mexican people * Mestizo * Hispanic ==References== * Category:Immigration to Mexico
title: Portuguese Mexicans
